titleInfo.title: News from Christian Brothers: Science Center Construction Begins

mods.abstract: The press release from Brother I. Leo O'Donnell, Director of Public Relations, provided information regarding the new construction project for the Science Center in 1966, including a description of the new rooms, the departments to be serviced, and the source of the funds, among them loans and grants from the US Federal government and the Tennessee state government.
